# Mercenaries
# Known variants # "Mercenary soldiers"
# "Mercenary breachers"
# "Mercenary specialists"
# "Mercenary captain"
# Missions objectives ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]mercenary captain[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]cybersun dataminers[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
